original: 上黨郡人，東漢時著名方士。創胎息養生之法，曹操曾召見他，見其童顏不老，顯非尋常之人，遂命其掌諸方士。
text: Shangdang county, famous alchemist in the Eastern Han Dynasty. Cao Cao once called him to create the method of fetal rest and health preservation, and saw that his youthful appearance was not old, and he was an extraordinary person, so he ordered him to take charge of the alchemists.
